This is a testharness.js-based test.
FAIL a chunk that cannot be converted to a string should error the streams TextEncoderStream is not defined
FAIL input of type undefined should be converted correctly to string promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextEncoderStream is not defined"
FAIL input of type null should be converted correctly to string promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextEncoderStream is not defined"
FAIL input of type numeric should be converted correctly to string promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextEncoderStream is not defined"
FAIL input of type object should be converted correctly to string promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextEncoderStream is not defined"
FAIL input of type array should be converted correctly to string promise_test: Unhandled rejection with value: object "ReferenceError: TextEncoderStream is not defined"
Harness: the test ran to completion.
